00062 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::DoDataExchange
00064     (
00065     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00066     )
00067 {
00068     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00069     DDX_Control( aDataExchange, IDC_CANRESP_LST_RESPONSES, mListBox );
00070     DDX_LBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_CANRESP_LBL_RESPONSES, mSelectedResponseIndex );
00071     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CANRESP_EDIT_ID, mResponseId );
00072     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CANRESP_EDIT_TEXT, mResponseText );
00073 }

00082 BOOL CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnInitDialog()
00083 {
00084     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00085 
00086     updateListBox();
00087 
00088     SetWindowPos( NULL, 700, 350, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOZORDER );
00089 
00090     return TRUE;
00091 } /* OnInitDialog() */

00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::updateListBox()
00098 {
00099     CString listItem;
00100 
00101     //must keep track of where the list was scrolled to
00102     //since we reset content we must reinitialize these
00103     int selectedIndex = mListBox.GetCurSel();
00104     int topIndex = mListBox.GetTopIndex();
00105 
00106     //reset content and then add current canned responses
00107     mListBox.ResetContent();
00108     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter = mCom.mCannedResponses.begin();
00109     for( ; iter != mCom.mCannedResponses.end(); iter++ )
00110         {
00111         if( iter->second.isValid() )
00112             {
00113             listItem.Format( _T("%d - %s"), iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
00114             mListBox.AddString( listItem );
00115             }
00116         }
00117     //reset scroll and selection
00118     mListBox.SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00119     mListBox.SetTopIndex( topIndex );
00120 }   /* updateListBox() */
00121 
00122 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnBnClickedDelete()
00128 {
00129     UpdateData( TRUE );
00130     if( mSelectedResponseIndex >= 0 )
00131         {
00132         mCom.sendDeleteCannedResponseRequest( mCom.mCannedResponses.getKeyAt( mSelectedResponseIndex) );
00133         }
00134 }   /* OnBnClickedDelete() */
00135 
00136 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 afx_msg LPARAM CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnCannedRespListChanged( WPARAM, LPARAM )
00142 {
00143     updateListBox();
00144     return 0;
00145 }   /* OnCannedRespListChanged() */

00147 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnBnClickedSend()
00154 {
00155     UpdateData( TRUE );
00156     uint32 responseId = _ttoi( mResponseId.GetBuffer() );
00157 
00158     mCom.sendCannedResponse( responseId, mResponseText );
00159 }   /* OnBnClickedSend() */
00160 
00161 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnEnChangeRspBoxes()
00167 {
00168     UpdateData( TRUE );
00169     if( mResponseText != "" && mResponseId != "" )
00170     {
00171         GetDlgItem( IDC_CANRESP_BTN_SEND )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00172     }
00173     else
00174     {
00175         GetDlgItem( IDC_CANRESP_BTN_SEND )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00176     }
00177 }   /* OnEnChangeRspBoxes() */
00178 
00179 
00180 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00186 void CManageCannedResponseDlg::OnLbnSelchangeResponselist()
00187 {
00188     CListBox * responseListBox = (CListBox*) GetDlgItem( IDC_CANRESP_LST_RESPONSES );
00189     int selectedIndex = responseListBox->GetCurSel();
00190 
00191     if( selectedIndex >= 0 && selectedIndex < responseListBox->GetCount() )
00192     {
00193         int index = 0;
00194         CString itemText;
00195         responseListBox->GetText( selectedIndex, itemText );
00196         index = itemText.Find( _T("-"), 0 );
00197         if( index > 0 )
00198         {
00199             TCHAR * itemBuffer = itemText.GetBuffer();
00200 
00201             TCHAR * responseId = new TCHAR[index];
00202             memcpy( responseId, itemBuffer, ( index - 1 ) * sizeof( TCHAR ) );
00203             responseId[index-1] = '\0';
00204             mResponseId.Format( _T("%s"), responseId );
00205 
00206             int responseTextLength = itemText.GetLength()-index-1;
00207             TCHAR * responseText = new TCHAR[responseTextLength];
00208             memcpy( responseText, &itemBuffer[index + 2], ( responseTextLength - 1 ) * sizeof( TCHAR ) );
00209             responseText[responseTextLength - 1] = '\0';
00210             mResponseText.Format( _T("%s"), responseText );
00211 
00212             itemText.ReleaseBuffer();
00213             delete[] responseId;
00214             delete[] responseText;
00215             UpdateData( FALSE );
00216         }
00217     }
00218 
00219     responseListBox->SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00220 }
00221
